identity.name: BluBridge HRMS
identity.vibe: Stripe Admin meets Architectural Digest. Clean, warm, but data-dense.

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.
layout.grid_system: Bento Grid for Dashboard (mix of col-span-1, col-span-2, row-span-2)

cards.style: Flat with subtle border. No heavy shadows.
cards.classes: bg-[#fffdf7] border border-black/5 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 rounded-xl

buttons.primary: bg-[#004EEB] hover:bg-[#003cc9] text-white shadow-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-black/5 text-gray-600 hover:text-black rounded-lg px-3 py-2

inputs.classes: bg-white border-gray-200 focus:border-[#004EEB] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#004EEB]/20 rounded-lg

badges.style: Soft pastel background with dark text.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use heavily in Sidebar and Sticky Headers. backdrop-blur-xl bg-[#fffdf7]/70
visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle mesh gradients allowed ONLY in 'Star Rewards' cards or specific hero areas. NO full screen gradients.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: All interactive elements must have hover/active states. Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use stroke-width={1.5} for elegance.

placeholders.logo: Use text 'BluBridge' in Outfit Bold, or a simple geometric shape SVG.

implementation_steps.details: Update index.css with new CSS variables for colors (#efede5, #fffdf7). Install fonts 'Outfit' and 'Public Sans'.
Create the AppShell layout with Sidebar (Left) and Header (Top). Ensure the main content area has the global background #efede5.
Build the 'Bento Grid' dashboard. Create 'StatCard' component. Use Recharts for simple line/bar charts (Attendance trends).
Implement 'Attendance', 'Leave Management', 'Star Rewards' using Shadcn Table and Card components. Customize them to match the 'Flat/Warm' aesthetic.
Add 'sonner' for toasts. Add 'framer-motion' for smooth page transitions. Ensure all buttons have active states.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings. Use 'Outfit'.
DO NOT use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0f172a).
Ensure all containers have the specific warm white background #fffdf7.
Avoid 'card' look for everything. Some sections can just be text on the background if hierarchy permits.
For 'Star Rewards', use a gold/amber accent color to make it special.
